Name: MARK-I: Mission Pilot
About the game: THE YEAR IS 21XX CORPORATIONS GAINED POWER WITH THEIR TECHNOLOGIES AND TOOK CONTROL OVER THE WORLD GOVERNMENTS FORCED TO SURVIVE AGAINST MILITIRIZED CORPORATIONS BY ACCUMULATING ARMORED FORCES AND RESEARCHES WITH MARK-I – NEW PROTOTYPE OF INTELLIGENT COMBAT UNIT... ARCADE SHOOTER Casual top-down shoot 'em up inspired by classic titles of 80s-90s. Repeat short but high-paced Mission Pilot for unlockable difficulties to harden your skills and became true experienced Pilot. COOP FOR 2 PLAYERS Complete the mission with your partner in optional synchronous single-screen cooperative. Combine different play-styles to create powerful binding. MINIMALISTIC DESIGN Unique stylized graphics with a lot of dynamic and destructible environment objects. Levels crafted with love and attention to details and quality. EXPLOSIVE ACTION! Use upgrades to create your custom MARK-I configuration to unleash full potential in combats. Master battle situations and be ready for surpising game sequences. The game contains one ~20 minutes short mission with ability to replay it on different difficulties – solo or with a friend on same screen. I appreciate any kind of support.
